title: Mexico says drug boss Guzman narrowly evades capture, sustains injuries
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Yesterday 
MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - The world's most-wanted drug boss, Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman, narrowly evaded security forces searching for him in t...
